title: sharing mount point with users appears as subdir with no name
body:
### steps to reproduce:
1. login as admin
2. mount an external storage to "/mountpoint"
3. create a user "user1"
4. share "/mountpoint" with "user1".
5. login as "user1"
6. navigate into the "shared" directory

### expected result:
the mount point appears as "mountpoint" and it is possible to navigate inside.

### actual result:
the mount point appears as a subdirectory with no name and it is not possible to navigate inside.

### more information
sharing a subdir inside of "/mountpoint" works fine, it's only when sharing the mount point directly that the issue appears.

@karlitschek @schiesbn @deepdiver1975 are users supposed to be able to share the mountpoint itself ?

if yes, this needs to be fixed.
if no, then we can remove the "share" permission as part of https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/5291
